name: Cursed Armor/诅咒铠甲
description:
Game Content:
1500 years after the Demon King's seal
An innocent girl, Lilina, who dreams to be the best adventurer in the world, starts her journey.
Unfortunately, because of her bloodline, she has been chosen by a demon. She is forced to wear a set of cursed armor, and goes on an adventure of finding six divine artifacts to remove the curse...

Key Points:
Make your character one and only:
All costumes effect charactor's avatar and pixel animations, with the Beauty Salon's cosplay system, you can customize the heroine your own style.
Immersive game-playing:
Scenarios matter! We take full use of the combinations of pixel animations and CGs to create perfect RPG game experiences.
Abundant contents:
All kinds of sexual events have been planted into multiple side-quests.
Various paths, endings and game rounds interact with each other, you will have a few hours of the enjoyment of the game!

Cards: According to the latest policies of Steam, cards will drop only when the game reaches to a certain level after its release.
